page.title: 12Industry and Countryside
page.content: When you get to{Frickley Pit}there is a lane that goes alongside it.As you go down the lane there is a{conveyor belt which throws all the coal rubbish away,then a massive truck comes and waits underneath the conveyor to carry the waste away.There are mountains of waste that we call{tips.}They are trying to landscape them with silver birch,hawthorn and oak saplings and they are also planting grass but much is left to nature. In the nearby fields you can hear all kinds of{birds,}such as Chaffinches and Skylarks.You can see{Winkhouse {Farm,}acres of farmland and Howell Wood in the distance.There are two farms on Broad Lane,{East Farm and {West Farm.}East Farm is a listed building. One is still a working farm but the other is now just a house.
